sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A manifest and breife discovery of some of the errours contained in a dialogue called the Marrow of moderne divinity. Wherein is shewen, especially the authors errour in the manner of the iustification of a sinner, and the truth cleared from all the falshoods contained in that booke concerning the same, with some other of his errours. I. A.
[4], 20 p.
Printed by T.W. for Joshua Kirton, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the White Horse in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1646.
"To the Christian reader" signed: I.A. A reply to: Fisher, Edward. Marrow of modern divinity. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb: 2d". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by T.W. for Joshua Kirton, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the White Horse in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1646.
